text:

text:
Subject: Brainstorm session for the company offsite

Hi everyone, we're starting to plan the annual company offsite. Please add your ideas for locations and activities to this shared document by next Monday.
label: To-Do

text:
Subject: Your task for this week

Hi [Name], your task for this week is to complete the user documentation for the new feature. Please let me know if you have any questions.
label: To-Do

text:
Subject: Critical: We have a major power failure

We are experiencing a major power failure that is affecting all of our services. We are working to resolve the issue as quickly as possible and will provide updates as they become available.
label: Urgent

text:
Subject: Recording of the Web Development Workshop

Hi all, for those interested, here is the recording of yesterday's workshop on advanced CSS techniques. Hope you find it useful!
label: FYI

text:
Subject: For your awareness: There will be a photographer in the office tomorrow

A photographer will be in the office tomorrow to take pictures for the new website. Please be aware and dress accordingly.
label: FYI

text:
Subject: Just a heads-up: We're having a pizza party next Friday!

Come and join us for a pizza party next Friday to celebrate the end of the month.
label: FYI

text:
Subject: FYI: We're having a potluck next week!

We're having a potluck next week to celebrate the start of summer. Please sign up to bring a dish.
label: FYI

text:
Subject: Please write a new company slogan

We are looking for a new company slogan. Could you please come up with some ideas?
label: To-Do

text:
Subject: Your flight confirmation for the upcoming business trip

Attached is your flight confirmation for your upcoming business trip. Please review the details and let me know if you have any questions. No further action is needed at this time.
label: FYI

text:
Subject: Company mention in Tech Today magazine

Great news! Our company was mentioned in the latest issue of Tech Today. Check out the article here. No action needed.
label: FYI

text:
Subject: Please create a new company app

We need a new company app. Could you please create a design and a development plan?
label: To-Do

text:
Subject: Please create a new sales presentation

We need a new sales presentation to pitch to potential clients. Could you please create a template and some content ideas?
label: To-Do

text:
Subject: FYI: The company is launching a new product

We are excited to announce the launch of our new product! More information will be available on our website soon.
label: FYI

text:
Subject: Critical: We have a major software bug that is causing data corruption

We have discovered a major software bug that is causing data corruption. We need to fix this immediately to prevent further data loss.
label: Urgent

text:
Subject: Heads up: Fire drill scheduled for this afternoon

This is a reminder that we will have a scheduled fire drill today at 2:30 PM. Please familiarize yourself with the nearest exit route.
label: FYI

text:
Subject: Critical: Your immediate response is required.

Your immediate response is required regarding the production issue that was just reported. Please join the emergency conference call now.
label: Urgent

text:
Subject: FYI: The company has a new employee discount program

We are excited to announce a new employee discount program. You can now get discounts on a variety of products and services.
label: FYI

text:
Subject: Critical: Website is down

Our main website is currently down. The tech team is aware and is working on a fix. We will keep you updated.
label: Urgent

text:
Subject: For your information: The company is offering a new employee benefit

We are pleased to announce a new employee benefit: a free gym membership! You can sign up at the front desk.
label: FYI

text:
Subject: Please Review: Q3 Marketing Report

Hi team, the draft of the Q3 marketing report is ready for your review. Please add your comments and suggestions to the shared document by end of day Friday.
label: To-Do

text:
Subject: Urgent: There has been a security incident

We have experienced a security incident. We are working to contain the incident and will provide more information as it becomes available.
label: Urgent

text:
Subject: URGENT: Last-minute change of venue for tomorrow's workshop

Hi everyone, due to a scheduling conflict, tomorrow's workshop will now be held in Conference Room B, not A. Please update your calendars accordingly.
label: Urgent

text:
Subject: URGENT: Your immediate feedback is required on the legal contract

We need your immediate feedback on the attached legal contract. Please review and provide your comments within the next hour.
label: Urgent

text:
Subject: Please write a new company jingle

We are looking for a new company jingle. Could you please come up with some ideas?
label: To-Do

text:
Subject: Please send me the report

Hi [Name], could you please send me the latest sales report when you have a moment? Thanks.
label: To-Do

text:
Subject: Follow up on our meeting

Hi [Name], just following up on our meeting from last week. Have you had a chance to look over the proposal I sent?
label: To-Do

text:
Subject: Please write a new company motto

We are looking for a new company motto. Could you please come up with some ideas?
label: To-Do

text:
Subject: Action item: Prepare for your performance review

Your performance review is scheduled for next week. Please come prepared to discuss your achievements and goals for the upcoming year.
label: To-Do

text:
Subject: Immediate action required: We have a ransomware attack

We are currently under a ransomware attack. We are working to contain the attack and will provide more information as it becomes available.
label: Urgent

text:
Subject: FYI: The office will be undergoing renovations next week

Please be aware that the office will be undergoing renovations next week. There may be some noise and disruption. We appreciate your patience.
label: FYI

text:
Subject: Please create a new company newsletter

We need a new company newsletter. Could you please create a template and some content ideas?
label: To-Do

text:
Subject: Immediate action needed: We have a security breach

We have experienced a security breach. We are working to secure our systems and will provide more information as soon as possible. Please change your passwords immediately.
label: Urgent

text:
Subject: Immediate action required: Your account has been flagged for suspicious activity

Your account has been flagged for suspicious activity. To protect your account, we have temporarily suspended it. Please contact us immediately to resolve this issue.
label: Urgent

text:
Subject: Update team contact list

Hi everyone, I'm updating the team contact list. Can you please reply with your preferred phone number and confirm your current home address? Thanks.
label: To-Do

text:
Subject: Critical: We have a legal issue

We have a legal issue that requires our immediate attention. We will be holding an emergency meeting to discuss this matter.
label: Urgent

text:
Subject: Meeting minutes from yesterday's call

Attached are the meeting minutes from yesterday's project sync call. No action needed unless you have been assigned a specific task.
label: FYI

text:
Subject: Just a heads-up: The CEO will be visiting our office next week

The CEO will be visiting our office next week. Please make sure the office is tidy and be prepared to say hello.
label: FYI

text:
Subject: FYI: The company is offering a new training program

We are excited to announce a new training program for our employees. It will help you develop your skills and advance your career.
label: FYI

text:
Subject: FYI: The company is launching a new website

We are excited to announce the launch of our new website! We've been working hard on it, and we hope you like it.
label: FYI

text:
Subject: Please create a social media campaign

Could you please create a social media campaign to promote our new product? I've attached the product details and target audience.
label: To-Do

text:
Subject: FYI: The company has a new recycling program

We are excited to announce a new recycling program at our company. Please make sure to use the correct bins for your waste.
label: FYI

text:
Subject: New Project Assignment

Hi [Name], I'm assigning you to the new 'Phoenix' project. Please familiarize yourself with the project brief attached and schedule a kickoff meeting with the team for next week.
label: To-Do

text:
Subject: Feedback on Draft

Hey, when you have a chance this week, could you look over the attached draft and give me your thoughts?
label: To-Do

text:
Subject: ACTION REQUIRED: Complete Mandatory Compliance Training by EOD

This is a final reminder that the mandatory annual compliance training is due by 5 PM today. Failure to complete it will result in a formal warning.
label: Urgent

text:
Subject: Please create a new company brochure

We need a new company brochure to hand out at trade shows. Could you please create a design and some content ideas?
label: To-Do

text:
Subject: Urgent: Your flight has been canceled

We regret to inform you that your flight has been canceled. Please contact the airline immediately to rebook.
label: Urgent

text:
Subject: Immediate action required: We have a server down

One of our servers is down. We are working to resolve the issue as quickly as possible and will provide updates as they become available.
label: Urgent

text:
Subject: Please write a new company manifesto

We are looking for a new company manifesto. Could you please come up with some ideas?
label: To-Do

text:
Subject: Urgent: There has been a change in the project requirements

There has been a last-minute change in the project requirements. Please review the changes immediately and let me know if you have any questions.
label: Urgent

text:
Subject: Critical: We have a major software bug

A major bug has been discovered in our software that is affecting all of our customers. We need to fix this immediately.
label: Urgent

text:
Subject: Please create a new email template

Could you please create a new email template for our marketing campaigns? I've attached some examples for inspiration.
label: To-Do

text:
Subject: FYI: The company has a new commuter benefits program

We are excited to announce a new commuter benefits program. You can now save money on your commute to work.
label: FYI

text:
Subject: Server Maintenance Tonight

Just a heads-up that we will be performing server maintenance tonight from 11 PM to 2 AM. During this time, you may experience intermittent connectivity issues.
label: FYI

text:
Subject: Please organize the company's files

Our company's files are a mess. Could you please organize them into a logical folder structure?
label: To-Do

text:
Subject: Please write a new company theme song

We are looking for a new company theme song. Could you please come up with some ideas?
label: To-Do

text:
Subject: FYI: The company is offering a new wellness program

We are excited to announce a new wellness program for our employees. It includes yoga classes, meditation sessions, and healthy snacks.
label: FYI

text:
Subject: Please vote for the team lunch option

Team, we're ordering lunch on Friday to celebrate our recent success! Please vote for your preferred cuisine in the poll below by tomorrow.
label: To-Do

text:
Subject: For your awareness: The office will be closed for a team-building event

The office will be closed for a team-building event next week. We will be back on Monday.
label: FYI

text:
Subject: URGENT: Security Alert - Suspicious Login Attempt

We have detected a suspicious login attempt on your account from an unrecognized device. Please reset your password immediately by clicking the link below. If you did not attempt this login, contact IT support right away.
label: Urgent

text:
Subject: Immediate action needed: Your account is compromised

We have detected unusual activity on your account, and we believe it may be compromised. Please change your password immediately and contact support.
label: Urgent

text:
Subject: FYI: We're having a book club meeting next week!

Come and join us for a book club meeting next week. We'll be discussing a new novel and eating snacks.
label: FYI

text:
Subject: FYI: The company has a new diversity and inclusion program

We are excited to announce a new diversity and inclusion program. We are committed to creating a workplace where everyone feels welcome and respected.
label: FYI

text:
Subject: Immediate action needed: We have a website defacement

Our website has been defaced. We are working to restore the website and will provide more information as soon as possible.
label: Urgent

text:
Subject: Information: The company is sponsoring a local charity event

We are proud to announce that our company is sponsoring a local charity event. We encourage you to participate and show your support.
label: FYI

text:
Subject: Information: The company has a new social media policy

We have a new social media policy. Please review it and make sure you are in compliance.
label: FYI

text:
Subject: Please organize the company's inventory

Our company's inventory is disorganized. Could you please organize it and create a system for tracking it?
label: To-Do

text:
Subject: Information: New company-wide Slack channels

We have created some new company-wide Slack channels for better communication. Please join the ones that are relevant to you.
label: FYI

text:
Subject: For your awareness: The office will be closed for a company retreat

The office will be closed for a company retreat next week. We will be back on Monday.
label: FYI

text:
Subject: ACTION REQUIRED: Mandatory Security Training

All employees are required to complete the mandatory security training by the end of the month. Failure to do so will result in your network access being suspended.
label: Urgent

text:
Subject: URGENT: Your immediate approval is required for the budget

We need your immediate approval for the revised budget. Please review and approve it by the end of the day so we can move forward.
label: Urgent

text:
Subject: ACTION REQUIRED: Potential Phishing Attempt Detected

Our security system has detected a potential phishing email sent to your address. DO NOT CLICK any links or open attachments. Please forward the suspicious email to the IT security team immediately.
label: Urgent

text:
Subject: Please proofread this document

Hi [Name], could you please proofread this document for any errors before we send it to the client?
label: To-Do

text:
Subject: FYI: We're having a karaoke night next month!

Get ready to sing your heart out! We're having a karaoke night next month. There will be prizes for the best singers.
label: FYI

text:
Subject: Please write a new company song

We are looking for a new company song. Could you please come up with some ideas?
label: To-Do

text:
Subject: FYI: New printer has been installed

A new printer has been installed in the breakroom. Please follow the instructions provided to connect your devices.
label: FYI

text:
Subject: Your flight information for your trip to Chicago

Hi [Name], your flight to Chicago has been booked. Your confirmation details and itinerary are attached. No further action is needed at this time.
label: FYI

text:
Subject: Urgent: Your account has been locked

For security reasons, your account has been temporarily locked. Please contact IT support to have it unlocked.
label: Urgent

text:
Subject: Urgent: Your immediate attention is required for a security vulnerability

We have discovered a security vulnerability in our website that could allow attackers to steal customer data. We need to fix this immediately.
label: Urgent

text:
Subject: Heads up: Fire drill scheduled for tomorrow

Just a heads up that there will be a fire drill tomorrow at 11 AM. Please familiarize yourself with the evacuation procedures.
label: FYI

text:
Subject: Just a heads-up: The office will be closed for a private event

The office will be closed for a private event on Friday. Please make sure to take all of your personal belongings with you on Thursday.
label: FYI

text:
Subject: ACTION REQUIRED: Your account has been locked due to suspicious activity

We have detected multiple failed login attempts on your account. For your security, we have temporarily locked it. Please contact IT support immediately to verify your identity and restore access.
label: Urgent

text:
Subject: FYI: The company has a new sabbatical program

We are excited to announce a new sabbatical program. You can now take a paid leave of absence to pursue your personal interests.
label: FYI

text:
Subject: Expense Report for October due

Hi, this is a reminder to submit your expense reports for October. The deadline is November 5th. Let me know if you need any help with the system.
label: To-Do

text:
Subject: Immediate action needed: We have a zero-day exploit

We have discovered a zero-day exploit in our software. We are working to patch the vulnerability and will provide more information as soon as possible.
label: Urgent

text:
Subject: For your awareness: The office will be closed for a national holiday

The office will be closed on Monday in observance of the national holiday. We will reopen on Tuesday.
label: FYI

text:
Subject: ACTION REQUIRED: Update your password

As part of our regular security updates, you are required to update your password within the next 48 hours. Please follow the instructions in the link below.
label: To-Do

text:
Subject: Urgent: There has been a medical emergency

There has been a medical emergency in the building. Please remain calm and follow the instructions of the emergency personnel.
label: Urgent

text:
Subject: FYI: The company has a new health insurance provider

We have a new health insurance provider. Please review the new plan and make sure you are enrolled.
label: FYI

text:
Subject: Please write a new company philosophy

We are looking for a new company philosophy. Could you please come up with some ideas?
label: To-Do
